attributes.name: Fortuna Chestplate
attributes.description: "Rise above all slumbering souls, tell sleepless tales of journey's bold."
attributes.parsed_description: "Rise above all slumbering souls, tell sleepless tales of journey's bold."

attributes.name: Freebooter's Bounty
attributes.description: "Aye, to another ripe pillage! Hand me that drink there, will ye? No, no, not that one... that one's yours, lad."
attributes.parsed_description: "Aye, to another ripe pillage! Hand me that drink there, will ye? No, no, not that one... that one's yours, lad."
